remarks.p:
The value of the value attribute is a string representing a date, date & time, time, or duration in any one of the following forms:
a date in any of the standard formats described by XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition
a time or combined date & time in the standard format as above, but with reduced precision (the minutes or minutes & seconds may be omitted — e.g., 12 and 12:00 are permitted to indicate noon, in addition to 12:00:00)
a duration in the format defined in the section Duration / Format with designators of ISO 8601.

The value of value is constrained to be in one of the date, time, or duration formats recognized by the W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes specification, except that times may be expressed with reduced precision. This is true whether the date component (if any) is a Gregorian or a proleptic Gregorian date.
